Audi recalls 
2019-09-02
Sino-German joint venture FAW-Volkswagen has started to recall 130,462 Audi Q3 vehicles in China due to defects. The recall, that began on August 29, involves certain Audi Q3 models manufactured in the country between December 2, 2015 and March 29, 2019, according to a statement posted on the website of the State Administration for Market Regulation.
